avalancheActivity.comment:
The avalanche prone locations are to be found in particular adjacent to ridgelines and in gullies and bowls above the tree line. Medium-sized and, in isolated cases, large natural avalanches are possible.
The wind slabs can be released, especially by large additional loads,.
As a consequence of warming, the likelihood of natural moist avalanches being released will increase gradually in particular on steep sunny slopes at intermediate and high altitudes.
avalancheActivity.highlights: The wind slabs of the last few days are to be evaluated with care and prudence.

snowpackStructure.comment:
The wind slabs are lying on the unfavourable surface of an old snowpack. The weather conditions will give rise to increasing moistening of the snowpack. Weak layers exist in the snowpack.
In steep terrain there is a danger of falling on the hard snow surface.

tendency.comment: The meteorological conditions will foster a settling of the snowpack.

avalancheActivity.comment:
As a consequence of warming, the likelihood of natural moist avalanches being released will increase gradually in particular on steep sunny slopes above the tree line.
Small and, in isolated cases, medium-sized natural avalanches are possible. The wind slabs can be released, especially by large additional loads,. The avalanche prone locations are to be found in particular in gullies and bowls, and behind abrupt changes in the terrain and adjacent to ridgelines and in pass areas.
avalancheActivity.highlights: As the day progresses as a consequence of warming during the day and solar radiation there will be a gradual increase in the avalanche danger.

snowpackStructure.comment: Sunshine and high temperatures will give rise as the day progresses to increasing moistening of the snowpack.
